org.webcurator.core.harvester.coordinator
Class HarvestAgentListenerSOAPService

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.remoting.jaxrpc.ServletEndpointSupport
      org.webcurator.core.harvester.coordinator.HarvestAgentListenerSOAPService
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.xml.rpc.server.ServiceLifecycle, CheckNotifier, DasCallback, HarvestAgentListener, IndexerService
public class HarvestAgentListenerSOAPService
extends org.springframework.remoting.jaxrpc.ServletEndpointSupport
implements HarvestAgentListener, CheckNotifier, IndexerService, DasCallback

The Server side implmentation of the HarvestAgentListener. This Service is deployed on the core and is used by the agents to send messages to the core.

Author:
nwaight
